card.title: Welcome to Quizly! 🎉
card.content: Thank you for participating in this experience. We will guide you through a series of forms designed to get to know you better. The process is simple and divided into several sections that you must complete in order.

steps.step1: 📌 Step 2: You will complete different forms one after another, each with specific questions about different areas.
steps.step2: 📌 Step 3: At the end, you will receive a summary with all your answers.

categories.personal_info: 📝 Personal information: We want to get to know you better, so we will ask for some general data.
categories.academic_evaluation: 📚 Academic evaluation: Tell us about your education and academic experience.
categories.technology: 💻 Technology: Let's discover your affinity with digital tools and technology.
categories.movies: 🎬 Movies: What type of movies do you enjoy? We want to know your film preferences.

rules.rule1: ✅ Complete all required fields in each form before moving to the next one.
rules.rule2: ✅ If a field is invalid or incomplete, you will receive an error message to correct it before continuing.
rules.rule3: ✅ Once you complete all sections, you will see a final summary with your answers.

card.advice: 💡 Tip: Take your time to answer honestly. There are no right or wrong answers, we just want to get to know you better!
